title: Edit Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Users who are signed in wants to edit profile from accounts page
custom_steps:
WHEN

From Homepage:
1. Go to top right corner of the page and hover over profile icon
2. Click on Edit Profile button to go to Account page
custom_expected:
THEN

User should be able to go to Account/Profile page

title: General Account Settings (Name)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Users who are signed in, want to edit profile from accounts page
custom_steps:
WHEN

Fill out the Name fields and Save.

1. First Name
2. Middle name
3. Last Name
4. Click on Save button to save
custom_expected:
THEN

User should be able to write his/her name and save it

title: General Account Settings (Nickname)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN


Users who are signed in, want to edit profile from accounts page
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Fillout the Nick Name
2. Click on Save button to save."
custom_expected:
THEN

User should be able to add a nick name.

title: General Account Settings (Contact)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Users who are signed in, want to edit profile from accounts page
custom_steps:
WHEN

Fillout the Contact fields and save:
1. Fillout the email field
2. Fillout the Mobile Number field
3. Click on Save button to save"
custom_expected:
THEN

User should be able to save contact info

title: General Account Settings (About)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Users who are signed in, want to edit profile from accounts page
custom_steps:
WHEN

Under About, select a date of birth:

1. Select a Month from month dropdown menu
2. Select a Day from day dropdown menu
3. Select a Year from year dropdown menu
4. Click on Save button to save the date
custom_expected:
THEN

User should be able to save a date of birth

title: General Account Settings (Manage your account)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Users who are signed in, want to edit profile from accounts page
custom_steps:
WHEN

Under Manage Your Account: 
1. Verify Delete My Account button is working

title: Change Your Password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to change password from account page
custom_steps:
WHEN

Under Change Your Password fill out following fields:

1. Current Password
2. New Password
3. Re-type New Password
4. Hit Save to submit new password
custom_expected:
THEN
User should be able to fillout all fields. Following criterias should be fulfilled:

- Must be 6 - 15 characters
- One uppercase letter
- One lowercase letter
- One number
- No Special Characters

title: Favorites and Follows (Favorite MILB team)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User is exploring the 'Favorite MILB team' drop down section under the Favorites and Follows section
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Under Favorite MILB Team drop down all the teams should be listed
- User should be able to select any team
- Verify once user selects a team, the team is visible on the field
- Verify user can tap/click the 'Save' button and the team name is saved
- Verify user can exit out without selecting a team by clicking/tapping the 'Cancel' button
- Verify once the user selects and saves a team the dropdown panel says "Your favorite team is (team name)"
custom_expected:
THEN

- Under Favorite MILB Team drop down all the teams are listed
- User can select any team
- Once selected the team is visible on the field
- Team name is saved
- User can exit the drop down panel
- The drop down panel says "Your favorite team is (team name)"

custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User is exploring the 'Favorite MILB team' drop down section under the Favorites and Follows section
custom_steps:

- Verify once the user selects and saves a team the dropdown panel says "The team you follow is (team name)"
custom_expected:
THEN

- Under Follow MILB Team drop down all the teams are listed
- User can select any team
- Once selected the team is visible on the field

- User can exit the drop down panel
- The drop down panel says "The team you follow is (team name)"

- Verify once the user selects and saves a team the dropdown panel says "Your favorite team is (team name)"
custom_expected:
THEN

title: Support
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User is exploring the 'Favorite MILB team' drop down section under the Favorites and Follows section
custom_steps:
WHEN

Verify the support page has these three embedded links in the copy:

- MiLB.TV Help Center
- Contact Us
- FAQ page

Verify clikcing/ tapping them navigate user to the appropriate pages
custom_expected:
THEN

-The links are embedded

-Clicking/tapping them navigates user to the appropriate pages

title: Log Out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User is trying to log out form the site
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Verify Logout option is listed under user profile dropdown
- Verify clicking/tapping on it user is logged out and the appropriate message is showing
custom_expected:
THEN

- Log in option is listed
- User can log out

title: Account Page Sections
custom_preconds: Given the user is on Account profile page
custom_steps: When the user navigates through the different sections of account profile
custom_expected: Then the respective section is displayed by verifying the section title

title: Verify Support Message
custom_preconds: Given when the user has logged into account profile
custom_steps: When the user is on account profile support page
custom_expected: Then the user must see the support page messages

title: Verify Support Links
custom_preconds: Given the user has logged into account profile
custom_steps: When the user is on the account profile support page
custom_expected: Then the account profile support must have the correct URLs
